predicate.note: Frames file for 'preclude' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No Verbnet entry. Comparison with 'prevent'.

roleset.name: stop, prevent

example.name: just transitive
example.text: At the same time, the government didn't want to appear to favor GM by allowing a minority stake that *trace* might preclude a full bid by Ford.

example.name: preclude to a kiss?
example.text: Mary's raging flu precluded John from kissing her.

roleset.note: I'm not sure the latter is actually grammatical, but 'prevent' predicts it. We'll leave it in pending further examples. I also doubt there will/can be a separate instrument argument.
